settings.question: I have received the wrong items.
settings.answer:
We are so sorry that you have received the wrong items.


Please return this back to us as soon as possible, so that we can get this resolved for you straight away. Please ensure that you choose the 'incorrect item(s)' option when choosing why you are returning you item(s).


We will get this sorted for you as quickly as possible.


Please note that if you would still like the items that you originally ordered and they are still in stock, you will need to place a new order for these items through our website as normal. You will receive a full refund for the order containing the wrong items.

settings.question: I am missing an item from my order.
settings.answer:
We are so sorry that you are missing an item from your order.

​

Please see below some likely reasons as to why this may have happened:

​

We may have sent your items in separate parcels, we would let you know of this via email, so please check your emails for this

The item(s) that you ordered went out of stock, since you ordered them, we would notify you of this via email so please check your emails for this

​

In the unlikely event of us missing an item off of your order by mistake, we will get this resolved for you straight away. Please get in touch with our support team to get assistance with this.

​

To contact our support team, you can do so via this link.

settings.question: I have received a faulty item.
settings.answer:
We are so sorry that you have received a faulty item.

​

Please return this back to us as soon as possible, so that we can get this resolved for you. Please ensure that you choose the 'faulty item' option when choosing why you are returning you item(s).

​

We will get this sorted for you as quickly as possible.

​

Please note that all items are inspected upon return, so items that can not easily be identified as 'faulty' and could instead have damage inflicted for other reasons may not be refunded in full, or refunded at all.

settings.faq_description: Need help with your order? We're sure that our FAQs can tell you what you would like to know!
